remarks.format: ## Remarks 标记作者可能有特定要求中的元素[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]UI，例如适用于文本长度、 字体系列或字体大小的约束。Markup authors may have specific requirements for elements in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] UI, such as constraints for text length, font family, or font size. 本地化人员需要了解它们以便提供一致的本地化。Localizers need to know about them in order to provide consistent localization. 本地化属性可以指定在[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]，从而允许作者为本地化人员传达其本地化需求。Localization properties can be specified inside [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)], allowing authors to communicate their localization needs to localizers. 这些属性进行本地化，可用于修改应用程序提供的规则和提示。These properties provide rules and hints for localization, which can be used to modify the application. 有两种类型的本地化属性：There are two types of localization properties: - 本地化特性。Localization attributes. 属性指定的资源，如，要进行本地化。The attributes specify which resources, such as , are to be localized. - 本地化注释。Localization comments. 注释是标记作者包含的自由格式文本。The comments are free-form text that the markup author includes. 有关如何使用这些本地化属性的详细信息，请参阅[本地化特性和注释](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/localization-attributes-and-comments.md)。For more information on how to use these localization properties, see [Localization Attributes and Comments](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/localization-attributes-and-comments.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示了本地化特性和注释定义一个文本块。The following code example shows localization attributes and comments defined for a text block.
